function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of inclusive and accessible facilities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cleaning involving people can increase the spread of disease","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in sense of loneliness during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on literature review and expert discussion may lead to biased or incomplete understanding of pandemic response","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate coverage of relevant data sources may result in incomplete information","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of distinction between research and development may hinder effective organization of disease mitigation efforts.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate emphasis on interdisciplinary collaboration may result in limited progress in disease mitigation strategies.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation through ai-based triage systems leading to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on digital technology for public health communication","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on accurate data collection and reporting","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of modeling studies for misinformation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on extrapolation of classic infection-control and public health measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of extreme quarantine measures and detailed contact tracing for the scale of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential ineffectiveness of traditional public-health strategies for tackling covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 due to increased contagion","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent movements","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of multiple measures simultaneously without clear evaluation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of travel bans in reducing covid-19 cases outside wuhan and hubei","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear replication of control measures and effectiveness outside china","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underreported cases of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large fraction of the population remains at risk of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of travel ban and emergency response leading to 744,000 confirmed covid-19 cases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate individual control measures during chinese spring festival holiday","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High incidence of confirmed cases in hubei and other provinces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Initial high case reproduction number r0 of 3.15","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effectiveness of control measures on trajectory of the epidemic outside wuhan city","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in implementing emergency control measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid dispersal of covid-19 from wuhan due to travel","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strong correlation between number of cases and travelers from wuhan","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission patterns and the impact of interventions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive data on covid-19 epidemiology, human movement, and public health interventions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission of the sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of vaccine or specific drug treatment for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declines in food security, trade, and tourism leading to reduction in incentives to conserve local biodiversity","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Boosting of tourism revenues leading to negative impacts on biodiversity conservation and wider sustainability goals","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Opportunities for health and well-being in nature","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interspecies transmission and pandemic risk","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 restrictions on human movement and trade on habitats, with quantifiable data lacking","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Deterioration of stability leading to an increase in violence, illegal hunting, and illicit trade due to acute perturbations such as war or strife","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Understanding human-nature interactions, including inter-species disease transmission pathways, and changes in motivations for seeking interactions with nature due to the pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Zoonotic disease outbreaks including covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on biodiversity conservation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interconnectedness of all things leading to spread of contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biodiversity changes associated with global human confinement and pandemic-related societal and behavioral changes","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decline in tourism revenue and disrupted trade routes leading to economic losses, poverty, and resource use","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consequences of declines in tourism and trade resulting from covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate messaging about the impact of COVID-19 on conservation efforts","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Opportunity for renewed emphasis on in-country partnerships and collaboration due to the pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Withdrawal of researchers and practitioners from conservation sites due to travel restrictions, leading to the cancellation or postponement of research","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear long-term vision affecting the continuity of conservation action and messaging post-pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"}]}
